title: I get support as second pick, third pick gets top but wanted support
body:
Because he only mains support and asks if I would switch, I tell him no because well I also only main support.

I had already set my pick intent to Poppy and we're blue side so we have first pick so if we're really scared it'll be taken away from us we can just first pick it. Except this jerk goes and bans it immediately.

It's cool though, our fourth pick went and banned his Karma for being an ass.
